name: Digital Monster: Union Black & White
description:
GUIDE:

15 seconds = 1 Year.

SHOP:

Meat: +4 Atk.

Bed: +4 Def, Cures Sleep.

Med: +4 Spd, Cures Sickness.

Toy: +4 Int, Cures Angryness.

EVOLUTION: 

White Version:

Botamon->Koromon: 3 Years, Always.

Koromon->Agumon: 4 Years, if Atk is greater than 6.

Koromon->Betamon: 4 Years. If Atk is lesser than 6.

Agumon->Greymon: 9 Years. if Atk is greater than 24.

Agumon->Tyrannomon: 9 Years. if Atk is greater than 12.

Agumon->Numemon: 9 Years. if Atk is lesser than 12.

Betamon->Seadramon: 7 Years. if Spd is greater than 24.

Betamon->Airdramon: 7 Years. if Spd is greater than 12.

Betamon->Numemon: 7 Years. if Spd is lesser than 12.

Greymon->MetalGreymon: 15 years, if Def is greater than 56.

Tyrannomon->MetalGreymon: 17 years, if Def is greater than 56.

Seadramon->Mamemon: 15 years, if Spd is Greater than 56.

Airdramon->Mamemon: 17 years, if Spd is Greater than 56.

Numemon->Monzaemon: 25 years. if Int is Greater than 80.

Black Version:

Punimon->Tsunomon: 3 Years, Always.

Tsunomon->Gabumon: 4 Years, if Def is greater than 6.

Tsunomon->Elecmon: 4 Years. If Def is lesser than 6.

Gabumon->Garurumon: 9 Years. if Spd is greater than 24.

Gabumon->Kabuterimon: 9 Years. if Spd is greater than 12.

Gabumon->Vegiemon: 9 Years. if Spd is lesser than 12.

Elecmon->Whamon: 7 Years. if Int is greater than 24.

Elecmon->Angemon: 7 Years. if Int is greater than 12.

Elecmon->Vegiemon: 7 Years. if Int is lesser than 12.

Garurumon->SkullGreymon: 15 years, if Atk is greater than 56.

Kabutermon->SkullGreymon: 17 years, if Atk is greater than 56.

Whamon->MetalMamemon: 15 years, if Int is Greater than 56.

Angemon->MetalMamemon: 17 years, if Int is Greater than 56.

Vegiemon->Vademon: 25 years. if Int is Greater than 80.

TRAINING:

Click 25 times in 5 seconds to get +2 in a Stat!
